ItemGroup.name: AppData
ItemGroup.item: It is always possible to change a selection.

ItemGroup.name: SharingPage
ItemGroup.item: Here, you can select who else is allowed to see the different types of data that e Wall stores about you.
Share my address information, data about my sleep, my daily phisical activity, my phisical exercises, my house with:

ItemGroup.name: NotificationsPage
ItemGroup.item: Here, you can decide which types of notifications you would like to receive and how often.
How often do you want health advice or do you want to talk about your health?
How often do you want to know about your house (like smoke detection, oxygen level)?
How often do you want to know about your medical signs (like blood oxygen level, blood pressure and heart rate)?

ItemGroup.name: AppearancePage
ItemGroup.item: Here, you can determine what your eWall looks like. It is always possible to change a selection.
Please select which books and games you want to have
What do you want to see in your photo frame?
Do you want to have the screensaver on or off?
